attributes.action: Require drivers to retake a driving test at 65
attributes.additional_details: I travel a lot, and often see older drivers who I believe should not be driving. Some misuse turn signals, others appear to have sight issues. Reactions also worsen with age.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to require drivers to retake their driving at 65, if they want their driving licence to remain valid.
